Uses of Car in racing.logic
 

Subclasses of Car in racing.logic
 class Drifter
          The drifter lacks in speed but has good acceleration and the ability of sharp turning.
 class Runner
          Runner has tons of acceleration , medium speed and low hit points.
 class Solid
          Solid is the default car, being the most balanced.
 class Speeder
          The speeder lacks in handling but has tons of speed.
